resource_dependency.articleDataSchema: Database table 'articles' with fields: id (UUID), title (string), content (text), author_id (foreign key to users), published_at (timestamp), category_id (foreign key to categories)
resource_dependency.userDataSchema: Database table 'users' with fields: id (UUID), username (string), email (string), created_at (timestamp)
resource_dependency.categoryDataSchema: Database table 'categories' with fields: id (UUID), name (string), description (text)

function: Fetch and display published health-related articles from the backend API
static_description: A grid layout displaying article cards with misty rose background and firebrick borders. Each card shows truncated article title, author name, publication date, and category tag.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking an article card navigates to the full article display page.

function: Establish connection to PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables for storing articles, users, comments, and categories
static_description: Backend service configuration file referencing environment variables for database connectivity with no hardcoded credentials.

resource_dependency.articlePublishSchema: API endpoint POST /api/articles accepting JSON with title, content, author_id, category_id
resource_dependency.categoryDropdownContent: List of existing categories fetched from GET /api/categories

function: Enable administrators to publish new health-related articles through a form interface
static_description: Article creation form with misty rose background and firebrick input fields including title textbox, content textarea, category dropdown, and publish button.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Publish' submits the form data to the backend API endpoint.

function: Allow users to browse articles through keyword search and category filtering
static_description: Main blog page featuring a search bar at the top with firebrick border on misty rose background, followed by category filter chips and article grid below.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking category chips filters displayed articles by selected category via API call.
Pressing Enter in search bar triggers keyword search across articles through backend API.

resource_dependency.commentsDisplaySchema: Database table 'comments' with fields: id (UUID), article_id (foreign key), user_id (foreign key), comment_text (text), created_at (timestamp)

function: Enable registered users to post comments on articles and view existing comments
static_description: Comments section below each article showing existing comments with usernames and timestamps, plus a text area with firebrick border on misty rose background for new comment submission.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Post Comment' button sends comment text to backend API and refreshes comment list.

resource_dependency.categoryManagementSchema: Database table 'categories' with fields: id (UUID), name (string), description (text)
resource_dependency.articleCategoryRelation: Foreign key relationship between articles.category_id and categories.id

function: Organize articles into predefined categories for easier navigation
static_description: Category tags displayed on article cards and dedicated category filter chips on main blog page, all styled with firebrick color against misty rose background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a category chip applies filter to show only articles belonging to that category.

resource_dependency.topicSubscriptionSchema: Database table 'user_subscriptions' with fields: id (UUID), user_id (foreign key), category_id (foreign key), subscribed_at (timestamp)

function: Allow users to follow/unfollow specific health topics to customize their feed
static_description: Subscribe toggle buttons next to category names throughout the site, displayed with firebrick styling on misty rose background when active.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggles subscription status for the selected category through backend API call.

static_description: Horizontal search bar positioned at the top of the main blog page with firebrick border and placeholder text 'Search articles...', set against misty rose background.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers search API call with entered keywords and updates article display with results.

resource_dependency.articleDetailSchema: API endpoint GET /api/articles/{id} returning complete article data including title, content, author details, and publication timestamp

function: Display complete article content with metadata on dedicated page
static_description: Full-width article page with misty rose background featuring large firebrick title header, author byline with publication date, and full content text block.

function: Enable filtering of articles by category on the main blog page
static_description: Horizontal row of category filter chips below the search bar on main blog page, styled with firebrick color against misty rose background.

interaction_and_states.description: Applies category filter to article grid by calling backend API with selected category ID.

resource_dependency.userDisplayNameSchema: Field in users table for displaying commenter names

function: Show all comments associated with an article in chronological order
static_description: Vertical list of comment blocks beneath each article, each containing user avatar placeholder, username in firebrick text, timestamp, and comment content on misty rose background.

resource_dependency.userSubscriptionsSchema: Database table linking users to followed categories

function: Allow users to manage their topic subscriptions through a dedicated interface
static_description: User profile section listing currently followed topics with unsubscribe buttons, styled with firebrick text on misty rose background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking unsubscribe button removes the topic subscription via backend API call.

function: Apply misty rose as the global background color for consistent site-wide styling
static_description: Entire website background rendered in misty rose color (#FFE4E1) as defined in global CSS stylesheet.

function: Style all UI components consistently using firebrick color for text and borders
static_description: All interactive elements including buttons, inputs, and navigation links styled with firebrick (#B22222) text and border colors against misty rose background.

function: Configure repository package.json to support unified installation and development commands
static_description: Root package.json file containing scripts for installing dependencies in both frontend and backend directories and running both services concurrently during development.
